name: Droid Fortress 2.0
description:
Short Description

Droid Fortress 2.0 is a First-Person roguelike wave shooter, it has 8 levels, every two levels you can spend your health to purchase upgrades such as: speed, extra jumps...

Difficulties
  • Trainee - Easy
  • Warrior - Normal
  • Slayer - Hard
  • Terminator - Harder
Install instructions
  • Download .rar file
  • Put it  on your desktop 
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Go into "Droid Fortress 2.0" folder
  • Double click on "Droid Fortress 2.0".exe
Controls

In the menu you can click "controls" to see what are the controls. (hide HUD with [H])

Extra info

Levels are procedurally generated from a base set (every two levels have different base sets). Enemies in the levels / rooms are randomly chosen by the AI, based on a value system (each enemy has a value designated to them and the AI has a max value it can spend per wave).

This took me 6 months to make. Whilst making this game I learned a lot. 

Code, models, animations, music were made by me.
